Title: test ballot
Preamble: Filling out the following ranking ballot will help design Open Source software for running better elections. Fill out each section as much as you feel is appropriate. You could just pick a 1st choice or rank all available options. Tie rankings are okay.

Issues.IssueHeader: Rank these ice cream flavors. 1 for most preferred.
Rank the Star Wars movies. 1 for best.
Choices: Episode II: Attack of the Clones
Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back
Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

Issues.IssueHeader: Rank the superheroes, on whatever basis you like. 1 for best.
